response.overview: Megamind (2010) is an animated film directed by Tom McGrath, in which the super villain Megamind finally defeats his nemesis, Metro Man, but loses all his purpose by not having someone to fight.  The story begins with two alien babies, one of whom lands in a mansion and becomes the hero Metro Man, while the other, with blue skin and a big head, lands in a prison and grows up as the villain Megamind.  After defeating Metro Man, Megamind becomes bored and creates a new hero named Titan, who turns evil and destroys Metro City.  Megamind must confront Titan to save the city and discover her own purpose.  The film explores themes such as the importance of opposites, the search for purpose and love, presenting a story full of humor and action.
response.tagline: The superhero movie will never be the same.
response.title: Megamente.2010
